::Switchblade/Astroblast::
A small blip on the scanners catches Switchblade's optic. He 
nudges Megatron, "Hey Megs, we have an interesting blip on the 
scanners, should we check it out? It looks like a pod of some sort."

Astroblast is waiting for Megatron outside the Dark Avian. 
"Megatron, we should hurry, the Autofire and crew are almost in 
position." He urges Megatron.


On 29 Mar 2001, at 5:19, gunthers8@... wrote:

> A singular pod flying aimlessly through space comes upon the earth and
> begins to enter the atmosphere. The problem is that the pod enters at
> a high degree and starts to burn up beyond any pods melting point. The
> computers fry and somehow the pod survived but badly burnt. As it
> hurled toward Earth somewhere in the Western Rockies of North America.
> It streaked through the sky as a hurling ball of fire and landed
> strike in the middle of a dense forest destroying everything around it
> for miles. The bots stasis pod went in search for a body but because
> of the extensive damages it entered Emergency Life Mode and found the
> closest thing for a body........
>
